physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed coarsened facial features, accentuation of the facial folds, and creases most prominent on the forehead. Sebaceous hyperplasia was also noted. The forehead and scalp had symmetric convolutions. Additionally, the examination revealed an enlarged tongue with increased furrowing, decreased breath sounds over the lower two thirds of the left lung, and bilateral digital clubbing.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 1-month follow-up after pneumonectomy, the pachydermoid skin changes had significantly improved; seborrhea had resolved and the digital clubbing was reduced.
